posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase a Emilio Palomino card from the 1909 Cabana series.  I am also interested in any other cards for this Cuban player.  Please contact me with any leads.

Thanks, 
Martin

[IMG]http://s107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/Cabanas.jpg[/IMG]
Leads, yeah, sure. I'll just check with the boys down at the crime lab, they've got four more detectives working on the case. They got us working in shifts!
